title: Vue Beach Club Afternoon Escape (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Vue Beach Club with its beachfront pool, chic daybeds, and ocean views in Canggu.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the beachfront pool and daybeds.
Sip cocktails while watching the sunset over the Indian Ocean.

title: Vue Beach Club Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside lounging, delicious food, and sunset cocktails at Vue Beach Club.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the beachfront pool, daybeds, and facilities.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Relax by the pool, enjoy the club's amenities, or take a stroll on the beach.
Sip cocktails while watching the sunset over the Indian Ocean.
